data.name: The Great Mikanko of Legend
data.desc: Special Summon 1 "Mikanko" monster from your hand, ignoring its Summoning conditions, but return it to the hand during your opponent's End Phase. During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY; send 1 "Mikanko" card from your Deck to the GY, except "The Great Mikanko of Legend". You can only use each effect of "The Great Mikanko of Legend" once per turn.
